<h1 style="margin-top:0rem;margin-bottom:0rem;"> Hi, I'm Antony Barja.</h1>

I have a degree in Geographic Engineering from the National University of San Marcos. In my spare time I spend my time reading articles about Geocomputation and Geovisualization. My passion is the use of FOSS4G, and very often I help the QGIS Peru community and collaborate in some open source projects. Finally,I like to share and teach what I learn. Feel free to reach out to me via [mail](mailto:antony.barja8@gmail.com) and subscribe to my email newsletter.
